judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB & HARYANA, CHANDIGARH

Date of decision: July 9, 2012 Kirpal Singh and others ....... Appellant Versus Gram Panchayat, Budhpur through its Sarpanch, Tehsil Kalka, Distt. Ambala and another ........ Respondents

Satinder Singh s/o late S.Amrao Singh r/p 10 Patel Marg, New Delhi ....... Appellant Versus Gram Panchayat, Budhpur through its Sarpanch, Tehsil Kalka, Distt. Ambala and another ........ Respondents CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN Present:- Ms. Alka Sarin, Advocate for the appellant. Mr. Ashish Gupta, Additional Advocate General, Haryana. **** K. Kannan, J (oral). . RFA No.2829 is against the order passed under Section 30 of the Land Acquisition Act raising a dispute of apportionment of the amount of compensation determined by the Collector. The amount is in the range of `1800/-. Counsel for the appellant states that notice to the parties has come back and that he has no instructions. . RFA No.2829 is dismissed for default. . RFA No.286 of 1987 is also dismissed for default. (K. KANNAN) JUDGE July 9, 2012 archana
